domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

text:
13/. Lack of transparency means little hard proof of #HerdImmunity plans, but a leaked document shows on 23/3 Faculty – contracted with Palantir to build NHSX platform - proposed a simulation to assess the impact of “targeted herd immunity” (an oxymoron).
https://t.co/37fjEdfBjS
